name: The Timeless King
description:
The Timeless King. A game created for the 1-bit weekend game jam.

You play as a king, whose kingdom has been corrupted, turned into radioactive wastelands over time. Your goal is simple, locate the source and destroy it.

W, S, A, D to move

Left click to attack

ESC to return to the main menu

Credits:

The font "Rainy Hearts" was used in this game.

Here's the link : https://www.dafont.com/rainyhearts.font
